title: C# Level 2 — Data Types & Operators
concept: Use integers and doubles with arithmetic, time and money calculations.

challenges.title: Fractional Part
challenges.description: Given a positive real number x, print its fractional part (x minus its integer part).

challenges.title: First Digit After Decimal
challenges.description: Given a positive real number x, print the first digit to the right of the decimal point.

challenges.title: Car Route Days
challenges.description: A car travels N kilometers per day. How many days are needed to cover a route of length M kilometers? Use ceiling of M/N.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: minimal number of days.

challenges.title: Digital Clock
challenges.description: Given N minutes since midnight, print current time in hours and minutes in 24-hour format.
challenges.outputDescription: Two integers: hours and minutes separated by a space.

challenges.title: Cupcake Cost
challenges.description: One cupcake costs A dollars and B cents. Find the total cost of N cupcakes as dollars and cents.

challenges.title: Hour Hand Angle
challenges.description: H hours, M minutes and S seconds have passed since midnight (0 ≤ H < 12). Compute the angle of the hour hand in degrees.

challenges.title: School Desks
challenges.description: Three classes have a, b, c students. Each desk seats 2 students. Print the minimum number of desks needed in total.

challenges.title: Timestamp Difference
challenges.description: Given two timestamps (h1 m1 s1) and (h2 m2 s2) on the same day, where the second is later, print how many seconds between them.
challenges.inputDescription: Six integers: h1 m1 s1 h2 m2 s2.

challenges.title: Smaller of Two
challenges.description: Given two integers, print the smaller one.

challenges.title: Tens Digit
challenges.description: Given an integer n, print its tens digit (second digit from right, or 0 if n has only one digit).
